front.title: Operating MPLS Transport Profile LSP in Loopback Mode

abstract.t: This document specifies an extension to MPLS Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) using which an MPLS Label Switching Router (LSR) can explicitly request another MPLS LSR to operate an MPLS Transport Profile(MPLS-TP) Label Switched Path between the two LSRs in loopback mode. This extension can be used to loop the data traffic up to certain LSR in the path of the MPLS LSP back to the source for management purpose.
